name: Fitocracy Dropdown Sorter
body:
# Fitocracy Dropdown Sorter

Are you tired of your activities in your performance page being sorted by frequency of use? If not... well, you don't need this :)

## Alpha-release page

Going to put it on the Chrome Webstore later, but want to get it tested a bit first...

[Link to CRX page](http://petems.github.com/FitocracyDropdownSorter/FitocracyDropdownSorter.crx)

[Instructions on how to install](http://www.labnol.org/internet/install-chrome-extensions/25817/)

Going to put it on the Chrome Webstore later, but want to get it tested a bit first...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
